Key Match Events: Domantas Sabonis dropped the game-winning basket over Bam Adebayo
Post-Match Reflections: The Miami Heat lost to the Sacramento Kings 111-110, despite having a 15-point lead at the start of the third quarter
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kevin Love's debut was delayed due to injury, Jaime Jaquez Jr. is averaging a career-high 7.6 rebounds, and Pelle Larsson finished with 13 points, 2 rebounds, and 2 assists on 66.7% shooting and 60% from three-point range
Others: The Heat have been outscored in the third quarter in every game besides against the Washington Wizards, and they have lost the rebounding edge in every game this season besides against the Wizards
